basics.name: Alex Cochran
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Writing code and developing systems to solve complex problems is my passion.

work.name: Cerkl
work.summary: I wrote code for our APIs and integrations, as well as handling customer deployments.
highlights: Developed Python & PHP REST API integrations for ETL with large customer datasets
Built and deployed containerized data transfer integration on customer’s infrastructure
Aggregated company data from multiple sources to build out a Customer Success database with a
frontend to accelerate support efforts and make finding information easier
Guided writing of customer integrations (mainly Python) against our REST API
Developed API endpoints to improve usability of our services
Took initiative to leverage Microsoft’s Power Platform to augment SharePoint Online integration
options in direct response to a customer need
Deployed self-hosted automations to send customer credentials securely
Configured and executed cloud builds and deployed services to Google Cloud Platform
○ Performed deployment of full sprint releases
Developed extensive and effective documentation for Cerkl’s APIs and integration designs
Crafted complex SQL queries for ad hoc reporting and customer support
Wrote Python applications to process and analyze datasets uploaded by customers for errors
Provided in-depth Python-based analysis of customer usage data to support feature requests

work.name: Center for Pulmonary Imaging Research
work.summary: I conducted precinical lung MRI studies and wrote applications to analyze the resulting data.
highlights: Collected data and wrote image processing and analysis software for preclinical MRI studies
Comprehensive ETL pipelines to produce images from raw data and compute statistics
Produced results for multiple studies on improving MRI and using it to track diseases
Redesigned and extended animal ventilation control system used during preclinical MRI
Introduced and implemented Git and GitHub in the lab to improve development practices
